summary: The MkDocs AI update log showcases the introduction of AI smart abstract features, reading time statistics, and intelligent caching systems. Version 1.2.0 introduces multi-AI service support, language-specific abstract generation, adaptive environment configuration, and flexible customization options. Technical features include unified API integration, error handling, timeout control, and display optimizations. Planned functionalities include multi-AI support, secure API key management, batch processing mode, data export, and web interface configuration.
page_title: MkDocs AI 摘要更新日志
